topics.body:
I still love of the premise of the Magical Boy anime is pretty much all about a bunch of dudes dressing up in colorful girly outfits, and their mission is to pretty much "love and tolerate the sh*t out of their enemies".

Yes, they actually do 'love and tolerate' their enemies into submission.
Now you cannot unsee that hilarious image.
